wmndsTextInputProps.name: id
wmndsTextInputProps.description: Required. Must be unique. The id of the input.

wmndsTextInputProps.name: name
wmndsTextInputProps.description: Required. The name of the input, which is submitted with the form data.

wmndsTextInputProps.name: type
wmndsTextInputProps.description: Type of input control to render. Defaults to text.

wmndsTextInputProps.name: required
wmndsTextInputProps.description: If true, input is required/must be filled out. Defaults to false.

wmndsTextInputProps.name: classes
wmndsTextInputProps.description: Classes to add to the input component.

wmndsTextInputProps.name: error
wmndsTextInputProps.description: If true, error will be displayed. Defaults to false.

wmndsTextInputProps.name: errorMessage
wmndsTextInputProps.description: Options for the error message component. See errorMessage.

arrayOptions.name: id
arrayOptions.description: Id attribute to add to the error message span tag.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. Text to use within the error message. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. HTML to use within the error message. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the error message span tag.

wmndsTextInputProps.name: disabled
wmndsTextInputProps.description: If true, input should be disabled. Defaults to false.

wmndsTextInputProps.name: maxLength
wmndsTextInputProps.description: The maxLength is the maximum number of characters allowed in the input. It's an optional field.

wmndsTextInputProps.name: placeholder
wmndsTextInputProps.description: Placeholder is a short hint that describes the expected value of a input. It's an optional field.

wmndsTextInputProps.name: value
wmndsTextInputProps.description: Optional initial value of the input.

wmndsTextInputProps.name: label
wmndsTextInputProps.description: Required. Options for the label component. See label.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentHTML is set, this is not required. Text to use within the label. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentText is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the label. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the label tag.

wmndsTextInputProps.name: formGroup
wmndsTextInputProps.description: Options for the form-group wrapper. See formGroup options below.

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the form group (e.g. to show error state for the whole group)
